import React from "react"; import DonorNav from './Nav' import donorhome from '../img/donorhome.jpg'; import './d_home.css'; import UserProfile from '../login/details'; var eid; eid=UserProfile.getId(); console.log("home"); const donor ={ backgroundImage: 'url(' + donorhome+ ')', width: '100%', height: '100%', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', backgroundSize: '100% 100%', } class Donor extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { pname:null, quant:null, quality:null, date:null, file1: null, file2: null, file3: null, file4: null, } this.handleImage1 = this.handleImage1.bind(this) this.handleImage2 = this.handleImage2.bind(this) this.handleImage3 = this.handleImage3.bind(this) this.handleImage4 = this.handleImage4.bind(this) this.pnameChange = this.pnameChange.bind(this); } pnameChange=event=>{ this.setState({ pname: event.target.value }); } handleImage1(event) { this.setState({ file1: URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]) }); } handleImage2(event) { this.setState({ file2: URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]), }) } handleImage3(event) { this.setState({ file3: URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]), }) } handleImage4(event) { this.setState({ file4: URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]), }) } render() { return (




); } } export default Donor
